alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued December 13 at 4:56PM EST until December 13 at 9:00PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 3 inches, bringing storm totals up to 10 inches. * WHERE...Northern Oneida county. * WHEN...Until 9 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The snow will taper off and end by late this evening.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
